comment: Dr. LeLand is so sweet! She puts a lot of work into each class, and we often get out early. She is also a super easy grader. Take her!

Leland's class is boring. Excruciatingly so. You'd think by the directions she gives you, it would be an easy A. No, she is a very harsh grader for no apparent reason. With a 3.94 GPA in my second to last semester, my lowest grades were from her. :) I do not recommend this class, it's basically useless.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: Most boring class ever. Pretty easy, but could honestly be a day course instead of a whole semester-long class. Sometimes she can take off points for bogus things. Simple assignments but feels like a waste of time. All content is already learned in previous courses.
My only complaint is that this class was super long and boring. I do not think it was engaging at all. The assignments were easy so this class is an easy A. No test, quizzes, or final.

Professor Leland was very kind and caring throughout the course and I had no problem with her personally. However, her lecture style is very slow and hard to follow, thus they are very boring. She also gears her class towards Elementary majors, as a secondary education major I found this class to be more of a hassle than a learning experience.

Easy essay every week, some extra assignments through out the class. Very easy as long as you do the assignments. Nothing is too taxing or difficult. Professor makes the class easy and understandable. Only thing is the class itself is very hypothetical.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--So many papers

comment: She gives a 3 paragraph essay every week and some other assignments every couple weeks as well. Not hard, just takes a little bit longer. Easy class as long as you do the work. No tests.

Professor Leland has had a lot of experience in the school system however she treated her college students just as I would assume she treats elementary students. Good content but I did not enjoy the delivery of her lectures at all. She comes across as fake, as if she is putting on a show and it distracted me from the content of the course.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS--Caring
